Summary: Like two stars blinking a danceing
divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside to let my dog out and as usual I look up at the clear sky to see the stars! Well I see what looks like a star then I started noticing blinking lights well I chalked it up toa plane well a plane does fly over head but lower than the blinking lights! I look back in the same spot and its still just there blinking! I check all the other stars just to make sure it's not my eyes! Then I look back again and it is like to blinking colored stars dancing around each other rather slow! I walk back inside to grab my I pad to get a picture but you can't see it in the picture and it had moved ever so slightly to the right! It is now 1 11 am and it has moved right again so I have to go down the steps now to see it through the trees! My dog is now refusing to go outside wich is weird for him!
